recipes.title: Chicken Adobo
recipes.instructions: Step 1: In a bowl, combine soy sauce, vinegar, garlic, bay leaves, and peppercorns. Marinate the chicken in this mixture for at least 30 minutes. Step 2: Heat oil in a pan. Sauté the marinated chicken until brown. Step 3: Pour in the marinade and water. Bring to a boil, then lower the heat and simmer until the chicken is tender and the sauce is reduced and thickened. Step 4: Serve hot with rice.

recipes.title: Sinigang
recipes.instructions: Step 1: In a pot, boil water. Add pork belly, onion, and tomato. Simmer until pork is tender. Step 2: Add sinigang mix and radish. Simmer until radish is tender. Step 3: Add kangkong and green chili pepper. Simmer for another 2 minutes. Step 4: Serve hot with rice.

recipes.title: Kare-Kare

extendedIngredients.original: 1 kg Ox Tail, cut into 2-inch pieces
1 bundle String Beans, cut into 2-inch pieces

recipes.instructions: Step 1: In a pot, boil ox tail in water until tender. Step 2: Sauté garlic and onion. Add annatto seeds and peanut butter. Step 3: Add boiled ox tail and continue cooking until sauce thickens. Step 4: Add vegetables and simmer until cooked. Step 5: Serve hot with bagoong (shrimp paste) and rice.

recipes.title: Sisig
recipes.instructions: Step 1: In a pan, melt butter. Sauté garlic and onion until fragrant. Step 2: Add chopped pork face and cook until crispy. Step 3: Add red and green chili pepper, soy sauce, and vinegar. Cook for a few more minutes. Step 4: Add mayonnaise and mix well. Step 5: Serve hot on a sizzling plate.

recipes.title: Lechon
recipes.instructions: Step 1: Rub pig with rock salt inside and out. Stuff lemongrass, bay leaves, garlic, and pepper inside the cavity. Step 2: Roast pig over charcoal until skin is crispy and meat is tender. Step 3: Baste with soy sauce, vinegar, and oil mixture every 30 minutes. Step 4: Serve hot with liver sauce and rice.

recipes.title: Paksiw na Lechon
recipes.instructions: Step 1: In a pot, combine vinegar, soy sauce, water, bay leaves, sugar, garlic, onion, and peppercorns. Step 2: Add chopped lechon and simmer until sauce is reduced and meat is tender. Step 3: Serve hot with rice.

recipes.title: Chicken Tinola

extendedIngredients.original: 1 kg Chicken, cut into serving pieces

recipes.instructions: Step 1: In a pot, sauté garlic, onion, and ginger. Add chicken and cook until slightly browned. Step 2: Add water and fish sauce. Simmer until chicken is tender. Step 3: Add papaya and chili leaves. Simmer for another 2 minutes. Step 4: Serve hot with rice.

recipes.title: Lumpiang Shanghai
recipes.instructions: Step 1: In a bowl, mix ground pork, carrots, green beans, onion, garlic, salt, and pepper. Step 2: Place a spoonful of the mixture on a spring roll wrapper and roll tightly. Seal the edges with water. Step 3: Heat oil in a pan and fry lumpia until golden brown and crispy. Step 4: Serve hot with sweet and sour sauce.

recipes.title: Halo-Halo
recipes.instructions: Step 1: In a tall glass, layer shaved ice, sweetened beans, sweetened banana, sweetened jackfruit, sweetened kaong, sweetened nata de coco, leche flan, and ube halaya. Step 2: Top with shredded macapuno and evaporated milk. Step 3: Add a scoop of ice cream on top. Step 4: Serve immediately and mix well before eating.

recipes.title: Bulalo
recipes.instructions: Step 1: In a pot, boil beef shanks in water until meat is tender and marrow is cooked. Step 2: Add corn, potatoes, onion, and garlic. Simmer until vegetables are tender. Step 3: Season with salt and pepper. Step 4: Add pechay and simmer for another 2 minutes. Step 5: Serve hot with rice.
